mapper.update:
update wms_order_out_plane_deail
order_out_id = #{orderOutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_code = #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
location_name = #{locationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_amount = #{planAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where order_out_detail_id = #{orderOutDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wms_order_out_plane_deail set order_out_id = #{orderOutId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_code = #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_code = #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_name = #{locationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_amount = #{planAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_amount = #{realAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined1 = #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined2 = #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined3 = #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined4 = #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_defined5 = #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modified_by = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, active_flag = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where order_out_detail_id = #{orderOutDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.order_out_detail_id, a.order_out_id, a.order_no, a.goods_name, a.goods_code, a.batch_no, a.location_code, a.plan_amount, a.real_amount, a.remark, a.user_defined1, a.user_defined2, a.user_defined3, a.user_defined4, a.user_defined5, a.create_by, a.gmt_create, a.last_modified_by, a.gmt_modified, a.active_flag, wms_goods_.has_box_code has_box_code FROM wms_order_out_plane_deail a LEFT JOIN wms_goods wms_goods_ ON a.goods_code = wms_goods_.goods_code AND wms_goods_.active_flag = '1' where a.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.active_flag = #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
